oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: County Court report and bill of sale for estate sales
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: County Court report and bill of sale for the public sale of land and slaves from the estates of Benjamin Springfield, John Reeves, Lazarus Denny, and Richard Compton. The four page document details items, buyer names, and prices paid for a sale held by the County Court of Hardeman County on October 16, 1858. Slave names are included for the Springfield and Compton estates. The last page lists the initials R. P. N. for R. P. Neely, the Clerk and Master of the County Court. Broadsides advertising the individual estate sales accompany the document.
